TopicTitle: Has anyone ever requested this, boots!

Articles.Content:
Not just any old boots, but magnetic ones so the kerbals can stick to the space vehicle without coming off and drifting away?

I'm pretty sure someone must have requested it, its a necessity really, for those like me who keep losing Kerbals because free floating Kerbals are a pain in the butt to get back...

(in other words, controlling free floating kerbals is impossible for me!)
